title: Das Erbe Deutscher Musik
additional-notes: This is a German publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

The first renewals shown here are the first that specifically mention this publication in the registered works database. Issues of this publication may have distinctive titles, and may also include musical works registered and renewed under Music.  We have not systematically searched either the distinctive titles, or the Music volumes of the CCE. Those wishing to clear copyrights for material in issues of this publication should search relevant CCE volumes and the registered works database for the material and titles of interest.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Shelton Henderson for copyright research on this title.
